data.name: The Third Shift
data.detailed_description:
A museum in need of security...
A person in need of money...
An odd occurrence

You are the new employee at the Roanoke Museum of History and Wonder.

Earn your paycheck.

The Third Shift is a Game Boy styled horror game that switches between first and second/third person. Watch your stamina and sustain your mental health as you patrol the halls and complete your third shift.

Be sure to clock out before you leave....

This game features:
-A horrifying tale of the lengths a worker will go for their job
-Over 3 hours per playthrough
-3 + endings depending on your path
-Achievements
-10+ color palettes to choose from

data.short_description: A Gameboy styled 1st/2nd/3rd person horror adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 80 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • Sound Card: Anything
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • Sound Card: Anything

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Violence, Blood & Gore, Nudity, Suicide
